aboutMe: My name is Olwethu Malumla and I am grateful for your interest in my portfolio. Thank you for viewing my work and considering me for potential opportunities. As a full stack developer, I have expertise in both front-end and back-end development, with proficiency in languages like visual basic,MySQL,CSS and Java Script. My strengths lie in problem-solving, debugging, and team collaboration, which have enabled me to deliver high-quality solutions and collaborate effectively with teams. I'm passionate about staying up-to-date with industry trends and exploring new technologies to continuously improve my skills. I'm excited about the opportunity to join your respected company and contribute my skills and experience to drive innovation and success. I seek challenging opportunities where I can fully use my skills for the progress of the organization to obtain entry level position in this field and utilize the theoretical and pratical education Iâ€™ve obtained so far. I am highly driven, I have great communication skills, I bring an environment that encourages others and that allows me to grow.Improving my skills, experiences and capabilities is my everyday job.

education.description: I am an intern at Life Choices Studio currently going through my first learning jouney which is networking
I studied Full stak software development at Life Choices
I studied PC TECHNICIAN AND NETWORK+ at Northlink College and the had a 6 months intenship at that very same institution
I studied CYBERSECURITY ESSENTIALS at Northlink College as an extra course while I was doing my practicals as a PC TECHNICIAN intern.
I studied Information Technology and Computer Science (NQF level 2-4) at FalseBay College
I attended high school(grade 8-12) at Aloe High School

soft_skills.Resilience: I refuse to let set backs disturb my goals.
soft_skills.Continuous Learning: I am commited to a lifelong learning process and professional development, with a strong desire to stay up-to-date with industry trends.
soft_skills.Effective Communication: I am not affraid to speak up and convey my opinion,new ideas or point of view in verbal or writtern form
soft_skills.Adaptability: I believe that I am a flexible candidate and I'm a fast learner
soft_skills.Problem-Solving: I have the ability to analyze problems, identify solutions, and implement effective solutions.
soft_skills.Emotional Intelligence: I never allow my emotions to take control of me.

testimonials.message: Olwethu is a dedicated and curious professional who consistently seeks opportunities to grow and improve. Her positive energy, exceptional work ethic, keen intellect, passion for learning and collaborative spirit make her a valuable asset to any team.

Olwethu's willingness to take on challenges and ask questions is truly admirable. Her inquisitive nature not only benefits her own learning but also fosters a culture of clarity and understanding among her peers.
Olwethu is a curious and brave learner who asks questions, driving her own growth and inspiring others to seek clarity.
Olwethu is a dedicated team player who delivers high-quality work with a positive attitude.
Olwethu is a charming, hardworking, and playful individual who makes others feel at ease. She's dedicated to coding, never gives up, and continues to grow and amaze.
Olwethu is a dedicated, reliable, and proactive team player who consistently delivers high-quality work with a positive attitude.
